turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Wishmaster 2: Evil Never Dies.
turn.1: What happens in Wishmaster 2: Evil Never Dies?
turn.2: In Vegas, the Djinn begins granting wishes to the casino patrons in order to collect the remaining required souls.
turn.3: Is there anything else what happens in the film?
turn.4: As Morgana and Gregory ride a cab through Las Vegas to the casino Demarest is operating out of, the Djinn stands in his office in his true form where he claims the souls everyone gave up through their wishes.
turn.6: Noting that Demarest has left the fire opal on his desk, Gregory quietly inches toward it while Demarest is speaking to Morgana.
turn.7: Is he successful in doing this?
turn.8: Demarest catches him and Gregory wishes for the Djinn to be sent back to hell.
turn.10: The Djinn grants his wish - with the caveat that they come along with him - and they're transported inside the fire opal where Gregory is crucified and Gregory is killed after Morgana wishes for him to be released.
turn.11: Is there anything else what happens in the film?
turn.12: Morgana angrily wishes for a world without evil, the Djinn says without evil, good cannot exist.
